asta.controller
Class AppController

java.lang.Object
  asta.controller.AppController
All Implemented Interfaces:
TextProcessStatusListener, java.util.EventListener
public class AppController
extends java.lang.Object
implements TextProcessStatusListener

The Controller of the application implemented as singleton The controller is the glue code between the model and the view

Author:
andreas.gerlach, andreas.pörtner

          adds the given word to the black-list of words in the settings and actualize the UI accordingly (mainly the top 10 list & tag cloud will be effected) the word will removed from the word-frequency list but still counts for number of chars, alpha-chars and words

the singleton pattern always returns the same instance of an object therefore there is a static variable holding the singleton instance

openFile

public void openFile(java.io.File selectedFile)
              throws java.io.IOException
checks the existing file handler for support to open and load the file given and if possible initializes the correct file handler object with the file

Parameters:
selectedFile - the file that is selected to be analyzed
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the file was not found or is not readable

setIgnorableWord

public void setIgnorableWord(java.lang.String word)
adds the given word to the black-list of words in the settings and actualize the UI accordingly (mainly the top 10 list & tag cloud will be effected) the word will removed from the word-frequency list but still counts for number of chars, alpha-chars and words

Parameters:
word - the word that should be ignored in the top 10 word list statistic

deselectWord

public void deselectWord(java.lang.String word)
deselect a word and remove the highlights in the UI text view

Parameters:
word - the word to deselect
